articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Virat Kohli spat at me': SA great recalls lesser-known first duel - Hindustan Times
articles.description: South Africa's Dean Elgar has recalled his lesser-known first duel with ex-India skipper Virat Kohli. | Cricket
articles.content: Virat Kohli won several hearts with his priceless gesture for South Africa's Dean Elgar, who bowed out of the longest format in the second and final Test of the bilateral series between the two crick… [+2512 chars]
